languages.text: If an enemy affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} within 5 cells from the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} attacks the Operative or their ally, that enemy suffers +1 additional exploit.
languages.original_text: Если противник с уязвимостью в радиусе 5 клеток от {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативника{/g} атакует самого оперативника или его союзника, то этот противник получает еще +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g}.

traits.locale_text: If an enemy affected by a clue within 5 cells from the Adept attacks the Adept or their ally, that enemy is affected by an additional clue.
If an enemy affected by an exploit within 5 cells from the Adept attacks the Adept or their ally, that enemy is affected by an additional exploit.

If an enemy affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} within 5 cells from the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} attacks the Operative or their ally, that enemy suffers +1 additional exploit.

languages.text: Если противник с уязвимостью в радиусе 5 клеток от {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}оперативника{/g} атакует самого оперативника или его союзника, то этот противник получает еще +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}уязвимость{/g}.
languages.original_text: If an enemy affected by an exploit within 5 cells from the Adept attacks the Adept or their ally, that enemy is affected by an additional exploit.

traits.locale_text: Если противник с уязвимостью атакует адепта или его союзника в радиусе 5 клеток от адепта, то этот противник получает еще 1 уязвимость.
Если противник с уязвимостью атакует адепта или его союзника в радиусе 5 клеток от адепта, то этот противник получает еще 1 уязвимость.

languages.text: 每当受到{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果影响的敌人攻击{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}特工{/g}或其盟友时，若该名敌人在特工周围5格范围内，则该名敌人获得1层“研究”效果。
languages.original_text: If an enemy affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} within 5 cells from the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} attacks the Operative or their ally, that enemy suffers +1 additional exploit.

traits.locale_text: 每当受到{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}研究{/g}效果影响的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻击{/g}技师或其盟友时，若该名敌人在技师周围5格范围内，则该名敌人额外获得1层“研究”效果。

languages.text: Si un enemigo afectado por una {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} situado en un radio de 5 casillas del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}agente{/g} ataca al agente o a uno de sus aliados, el enemigo sufre +1 vulnerabilidad adicional.
languages.original_text: If an enemy affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} within 5 cells from the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} attacks the Operative or their ally, that enemy suffers +1 additional exploit.

traits.locale_text: Si un enemigo afectado por una {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}vulnerabilidad{/g} situado en un radio de 5 casillas del agente ataca al agente o a uno de sus aliados, el enemigo sufre una vulnerabilidad adicional.

languages.text: オペレーターの半径5セル以内にいる{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}の影響を受けている敵が{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}オペレーター{/g}または味方を攻撃すると、その敵に追加でエクスプロイトが適用される。
languages.original_text: If an enemy affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} within 5 cells from the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} attacks the Operative or their ally, that enemy suffers +1 additional exploit.

traits.locale_text: アデプトの半径5セル以内にいる{g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}エクスプロイト{/g}の影響を受けている敵がアデプトまたは味方を{g|Encyclopedia:Attack}攻撃{/g}すると、その敵に追加でエクスプロイトが適用される。

languages.text: Immer wenn ein von {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzung{/g} betroffener Feind innerhalb eines 5-Felder-Radius um den {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Agenten{/g} Letzteren oder einen seiner Verbündeten angreift, erleidet dieser Feind +1 zusätzliche Ausnutzung.
languages.original_text: If an enemy affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} within 5 cells from the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} attacks the Operative or their ally, that enemy suffers +1 additional exploit.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn ein von {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}Ausnutzen{/g} betroffener Feind innerhalb eines 5-Felder-Radius um den Agenten Letzteren oder einen seiner Verbündeten angreift, wird der Effekt auf den Feind um ein zusätzliches Ausnutzen erhöht.

languages.text: Si un ennemi sous l'effet d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} et situé à moins de 5 cases de l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Opérateur{/g} attaque l'Opérateur ou son allié, cet ennemi subit l'effet d'un exploit supplémentaire.
languages.original_text: If an enemy affected by an {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} within 5 cells from the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAdeptGlossary}Operative{/g} attacks the Operative or their ally, that enemy suffers +1 additional exploit.

traits.locale_text: Si un ennemi sous l'effet d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Exploit}exploit{/g} et situé à moins de 5 cases de l'Adepte {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attaque{/g} l'Adepte ou son allié, cet ennemi subit l'effet d'un exploit supplémentaire.
